column4: How can I make Remote Desktop Viewer in Ubuntu work over internet instead of just local home network ? I have forwrded the 5900 port on my router still no luck
where do you mean do i see 5900 open ? in my router ?
im assuming nmap on the computer i want to connect to right ? just making sure lol
if you want to access your ubuntu over the internet you have to use port-forwarding in your router
you can only forwarding a port ones
you have to to something like 5900 on 192.168.0.2:5900 5901 on 192.168.0.3:5900 and so on
you have one rule for every port-forwarding
and you dont have to "fight" with NAT
